property.name: Description
property.value: The first time you attack each turn, draw a card.

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 mortal wound to a target.

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 standard wounds to a target with 6 or more health or deal 2 standard wounds to a target with 5 or less health.

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 2 standard wounds to a target with 6 or more health or deal 2 standard wound and 1 mortal wound to a target with 5 or less health.

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 standard wound to any number of targets or 2 standard wounds to one target.

property.name: Description
property.value: Attacks deal 1 additional standard wound. Finesse attacks cost 1 less stamina to play (minimum 0).

property.name: Description
property.value: Brutal attacks deal 1 additional mortal wound.

property.name: Description
property.value: When you would be dealt at least 2 standard wounds during an attack, you receive 1 less.

property.name: Description
property.value: When you attack or cast a spell, you must either discard a card or take 1 standard wound.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [IF, [NORMALWOUNDS, TARGET, "Mortal"], [AFFLICT, [GETWOUND, TARGET, "Mortal"], THIS], [FAIL, "That target does not have any mortal wounds."]]

property.name: Constant_Script
property.value: [1, [ON, [AND, [OR, [ISATTACK], [ISSPELL]], [EQUAL, CHARACTER, [OWNER, THIS]]], [IF, [CHOOSE, "Your hand is maimed. Do you fight the pain (take 1 standard wound) or give up the advantage (discard 1 card)?", "Take Wound", "Discard Card"], [PAYDISCARD], [TAKEWOUNDS, 1, "Standard"]]]]

property.name: Description
property.value: When you retreat, you must either draw 2 fewer cards or take 1 standard wound.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [IF, [NORMALWOUNDS, TARGET, "Mortal"], [AFFLICT, [GETWOUND, TARGET, "Mortal"], THIS], [FAIL, "That target does not have any mortal wounds."]]

property.name: Constant_Script
property.value: [-1, [ON, [AND, [EQUAL, TYPE, "Retreat"], [EQUAL, CHARACTER, [OWNER, THIS]]], [IF, [CHOOSE, "You are limping. Do you fight the pain (draw all cards and take 1 standard wound) or retreat more slowly (draw 2 fewer cards)?", "Take Wound", "Draw Fewer"], [DO, [BLOCKDRAW], [BLOCKDRAW]], [TAKEWOUNDS, 1, "Standard"]]]]

property.name: Description
property.value: When you start you turn, you must either not draw or take 1 standard wound.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [IF, [NORMALWOUNDS, TARGET, "Mortal"], [AFFLICT, [GETWOUND, TARGET, "Mortal"], THIS], [FAIL, "That target does not have any mortal wounds."]]

property.name: Constant_Script
property.value: [-1, [ONTURNSTART, [IF, [CHOOSE, "You are half-blinded. Do you open your eye (draw a card and take 1 standard wound) or keep it shut (don't draw).", "Take Wound", "Skip Draw"], [BLOCKDRAW, 1], [TAKEWOUNDS, 1, "Standard"]]]]

property.name: Description
property.value: At the start of your turn, take 1 standard wound.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [IF, [NORMALWOUNDS, TARGET, "Mortal"], [AFFLICT, [GETWOUND, TARGET, "Mortal"], THIS], [FAIL, "That target does not have any mortal wounds."]]

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 standard wounds to a target. Wounds from this attack may not be prevented.

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 mortal wound and 3 standard wounds to a target with at least 3 mortal wounds and 7 or less health.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [PAYSTAMINA, 2], [IF, [AND, [GTE, [WOUNDS, TARGET, "Mortal"], 3], [LTE, [HEALTH, TARGET], 7]], [DO, [DEAL, 1, "Mortal", TARGET], [DEAL, 3, "Standard", TARGET]], [FAIL, "Target does not have required damage."]]

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 standard wound to a target. This attack cannot deal additional wounds.

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 standard wound to a target. Draw a card.

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 standard wound to a target. May not be played the same turn as you punch.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [ON, [THISTURN, [EQUAL, SUBTYPE, "Punch"]], [FAIL, "You have punched this turn and may not Slash."]], [GETENEMY], [DEAL, 1, "Standard", TARGET], [CONSTANT]

property.name: Constant_Script
property.value: [0, [ONTURNEND, [DISCARD]]], [0, [ON, [EQUAL, SUBTYPE, "Punch"], [FAIL, "You have Slashed with your weapon this turn and may not punch."]]]

property.name: Description
property.value: Name a type of card (Spell, Attack, or Tactic). Pick a target to randomly discard 1 card from their hand. If you named the type of that card, deal 2 standard wounds to that target. Otherwise, deal 1 standard wound to that target.

property.name: Play_Script
property.value: [GETENEMY], [PAYSTAMINA, 1], [SET, SUNDERED, [CHOOSETYPE, "What type of action are you sundering?"]], [IF, [EQUAL, [TYPE, [FORCEDISCARD, TARGET]], [GET, SUNDERED]], [DEAL, 2, "Standard", TARGET], [DEAL, 1, "Standard", TARGET]]

property.name: Description
property.value: Your attacks deal 1 additional standard wound. Keep in play until you cure a wound or afflict anyone.

property.name: Constant_Script
property.value: [0, [ON, [AND, [ISATTACK], [EQUAL, CHARACTER, [OWNER, THIS]]], [DEALEXTRA, 1, "Standard"]]], [1, [ON, [AND, [OR, [EQUAL, TYPE, "Affliction"], [GT, [CURED, ANY], 0]], [EQUAL, CHARACTER, [OWNER, THIS]]], [DISCARD]]]

property.name: Description
property.value: Your next Brutal attack this turn deals 1 additional mortal wound.

property.name: Description
property.value: Your next attack deals 1 additional standard wound. Draw a card.

property.name: Description
property.value: Your attacks deal 1 additional standard wound. Keep in play until one of your attacks deals 3 or fewer wounds.

property.name: Constant_Script
property.value: [0, [ON, [AND, [EQUAL, CHARACTER, [OWNER, THIS]], [ISATTACK]], [DEALEXTRA, 1, "Standard"]]], [3, [ON, [AND, [EQUAL, CHARACTER, [OWNER, THIS]], [ISATTACK], [LTE, [DEALT, ANY, ANY], 3]], [DISCARD]]]

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 2 standard wounds to a target. Draw two cards.

property.name: Description
property.value: Your next attack deals 1 additional frost wound.

property.name: Description
property.value: Your next attack deals 1 additional burn wound.

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 mortal wounds to a target with 6 or more health or 2 mortal wounds to a target with 5 or less health.
